title: Crop uploaded brand image to transparent logo lockup and replace header/footer branding

requirements.text: Create a new transparent PNG asset by cropping the uploaded image `1770306231356.png` to include only the flower-like logo, the word “Aurelie”, and the smaller text “Fine Jewellery” (remove all surrounding background), and add it to the frontend static assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`.

quotes: Crop the image and extract only logo and brandname and update in header and footer as it is. So that background looks transparent

1 only the logo, word Aurelie and smaller text Fine jewellery 
2 yes both header and footer 
3 yes change completely in header and footer

acceptanceCriteria: A new PNG file exists at `frontend/public/assets/generated/` created from `1770306231356.png`.
The new PNG contains only the logo + “Aurelie” + “Fine Jewellery” with a transparent background (alpha channel), with no visible beige/cream background around the mark.
The crop is tight with modest padding so no parts of the mark are cut off.

requirements.text: Replace the header branding image in `frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx` so it uses the newly generated transparent logo lockup asset instead of `/assets/1770304385246~2.png`, keeping the existing header layout/behavior (sticky header, scroll resize, navigation button).

quotes: yes change completely in header and footer

acceptanceCriteria: Header logo `` `src` points to the new generated asset path under `/assets/generated/`.
Header branding renders correctly at both scroll states (`h-16` and `h-20`) with no background box/edge visible behind the mark.

requirements.text: Replace the footer branding in `frontend/src/components/footer/FooterSystem.tsx` so the left-column brand block uses the newly generated transparent logo lockup as a single image (remove the existing separate logo image and separate “Aurelie”/“Fine Jewellery” text), while keeping the rest of the footer content unchanged.

quotes: 3 yes change completely in header and footer

acceptanceCriteria: Footer brand section no longer renders `/assets/1770214375269~2-2.png` or separate “Aurelie”/“Fine Jewellery” text nodes.
Footer brand section renders the new generated transparent asset under `/assets/generated/` as a single ``.
Footer layout remains aligned and responsive (no overflow or broken spacing on mobile and desktop).

constraints: Do not modify files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose them only).
Do not modify any paths listed in `frontend.immutablePaths` from SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Changing the header background color or adding a header background fill.
Reworking footer links, contact info, or policy content beyond swapping the branding element.

edits: Crop to the logo + “Aurelie” + “Fine Jewellery” only and remove all background to transparent (1770306231356.png > aurelie-lockup-transparent.dim_1000x320.png)
